title.description: The display name for the dashboard.

model.description: The model name powering the dashboard; used for Rill models. Required if 'table' is not provided.

table.description: The table name powering the dashboard; used instead of 'model' for dashboards created directly from sources or external OLAP tables.

timeseries.description: The timestamp column from your model for x-axis data in line charts. Optional; if not specified, line charts will not appear.

default_time_range.description: The default time range shown when a user initially loads the dashboard. Defaults to the full time range of the timeseries column if not specified.

smallest_time_grain.description: The smallest time granularity allowed for viewing in the dashboard.

available_time_zones.description: Time zones to be pinned at the top of the time zone selector, making the dashboard time zone aware.

first_day_of_week.description: The first day of the week for time grain aggregation. 1 for Monday through 7 for Sunday.

first_month_of_year.description: The first month of the year for time grain aggregation. 1 for January through 12 for December.

default_theme.description: The default theme to apply to the dashboard. A valid theme must be defined in the project.

name.description: A stable identifier for the dimension.

label.description: A label for the dashboard dimension.

column.description: A categorical column for the dimension.

property.description: A property reference for the dimension.

expression.description: A non-aggregate expression for the dimension. Required if 'column' is not provided.

description.description: A freeform text description of the dimension.

ignore.description: If true, hides the dimension from the dashboard.

unnest.description: Allows multi-valued dimensions to be unnested, switching filters to 'contains' instead of exact match.

dimensions.description: Definitions of dimensions for exploring segments and filtering the dashboard.

name.description: A stable identifier for the measure.

label.description: A label for the dashboard measure.

expression.description: An expression combining operators and functions for aggregations.

description.description: A freeform text description of the measure.

format_preset.description: Controls the formatting of this measure in the dashboard.

format_d3.description: Controls the formatting of this measure using a d3-format string.

format_d3_locale.description: Defines a custom locale for d3-format.

grouping.description: The array of group sizes (e.g., [3]), cycled as needed.

numerals.description: Optional array of ten strings to replace the numerals 0-9.

percent.description: Optional symbol to replace the percent suffix.

ignore.description: If true, hides the measure from the dashboard.

valid_percent_of_total.description: Indicates whether percent-of-total values should be rendered for this measure.

measures.description: Numeric aggregates of columns from your data model.
